function.name: create_task
function.description: Creates a new task in Todoist.

content.description: The main text content of the task (e.g., 'Buy milk').

description.description: Optional detailed notes for the task.

project_id.description: ID of the project to add the task to. Defaults to the user's Inbox.

section_id.description: ID of the section to add the task to.

parent_id.description: ID of a parent task, to create a sub-task.

order.description: The position of the task within its list.

labels.description: An array of label names to attach to the task.

assignee_id.description: The ID of a user to assign the task to in a shared project.

due_string.description: A natural language string for the due date (e.g., 'tomorrow at 4pm' or 'every Tuesday').

due_date.description: A specific due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

due_datetime.description: A specific due date and time in a UTC-based format (e.g., '2025-08-12T18:00:00Z').

duration.description: The amount of time the task is expected to take.

function.name: get_tasks
function.description: Returns a list of active (non-completed) tasks, with optional filters.

project_id.description: Filter tasks by a specific project ID.

section_id.description: Filter tasks by a specific section ID.

parent_id.description: Filter tasks by a specific parent task ID to get its sub-tasks.

label.description: Filter tasks by a label name.

ids.description: A comma-separated list of specific task IDs to retrieve.

function.name: get_task
function.description: Retrieves a single active task by its ID.

task_id.description: The unique ID of the task to retrieve.

function.name: update_task
function.description: Updates an existing task. Only provide the fields you want to change.

task_id.description: The ID of the task to update.

content.description: The new text content for the task.

description.description: The new detailed notes for the task.

labels.description: A new array of label names to attach to the task.

due_string.description: The new natural language due date string.

due_date.description: The new specific due date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

due_datetime.description: The new specific due date and time in a UTC-based format.

assignee_id.description: The ID of a user to assign the task to.

function.name: close_task
function.description: Marks a task as completed. For recurring tasks, it schedules the next occurrence.

task_id.description: The ID of the task to close.

function.name: reopen_task
function.description: Reverts a completed task back to its active state.

task_id.description: The ID of the task to reopen.

function.name: delete_task
function.description: Permanently deletes a task.

task_id.description: The ID of the task to delete.

function.name: move_task
function.description: Moves a task to a different project, section, or parent task. Only one destination (project_id, section_id, or parent_id) should be provided.

task_id.description: The ID of the task to move.

project_id.description: The ID of the destination project.

section_id.description: The ID of the destination section.

parent_id.description: The ID of the destination parent task.

function.name: create_project
function.description: Creates a new project.

name.description: The name of the new project.

parent_id.description: To create a sub-project, provide the parent project's ID.

color.description: A color name for the project icon (e.g., 'berry_red').

is_favorite.description: Whether to mark the project as a favorite.

view_style.description: The default view for the project.

function.name: get_projects
function.description: Returns a list of all active projects.

function.name: get_project
function.description: Retrieves a single project by its ID.

project_id.description: The unique ID of the project.

function.name: update_project
function.description: Updates an existing project. Only provide the fields you want to change.

project_id.description: The ID of the project to update.

name.description: The new name for the project.

color.description: The new color name for the project icon.

is_favorite.description: The new favorite status for the project.

view_style.description: The new default view for the project.

function.name: delete_project
function.description: Deletes a project and all of its tasks.

project_id.description: The ID of the project to delete.

function.name: archive_project
function.description: Archives a project.

project_id.description: The ID of the project to archive.

function.name: unarchive_project
function.description: Unarchives a project.

project_id.description: The ID of the project to unarchive.

function.name: create_section
function.description: Creates a new section within a project.

name.description: The name of the new section.

project_id.description: The ID of the project this section will belong to.

order.description: The position of the section within the project.

function.name: get_sections
function.description: Gets all sections, optionally filtered by a project.

project_id.description: If provided, returns only sections for this project ID.

function.name: get_section
function.description: Retrieves a single section by its ID.

section_id.description: The unique ID of the section.

function.name: update_section
function.description: Updates an existing section's name.

section_id.description: The ID of the section to update.

name.description: The new name for the section.

function.name: delete_section
function.description: Deletes a section.

section_id.description: The ID of the section to delete.

function.name: create_comment
function.description: Creates a new comment on either a task or a project. One of task_id or project_id is required.

content.description: The text content of the comment.

task_id.description: The ID of the task to comment on.

project_id.description: The ID of the project to comment on.

function.name: get_comments
function.description: Returns a list of comments for a given task or project. One of task_id or project_id is required.

task_id.description: The ID of the task to retrieve comments for.

project_id.description: The ID of the project to retrieve comments for.

function.name: delete_comment
function.description: Deletes a comment.

comment_id.description: The ID of the comment to delete.

function.name: create_label
function.description: Creates a new personal label.

name.description: The name of the new label.

order.description: The position of the label in the label list.

color.description: A color name for the label icon.

is_favorite.description: Whether to mark the label as a favorite.

function.name: get_labels
function.description: Returns a list of all personal labels.

function.name: get_label
function.description: Retrieves a single label by its ID.

label_id.description: The unique ID of the label.

function.name: update_label
function.description: Updates an existing personal label.

label_id.description: The ID of the label to update.

name.description: The new name for the label.

order.description: The new position of the label in the list.

color.description: The new color name for the label.

is_favorite.description: The new favorite status for the label.

function.name: delete_label
function.description: Deletes a personal label.

label_id.description: The ID of the label to delete.
